title: Issues in education: the Victorian Certificate of Education
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: A panel of educationalists, including two members of the Ministerial Committee for Review of Post-Compulsory Schooling, overview the new Victorian Certificate of Education and current issues in education.
